__comment2: PlacementModifiers. We start some set of input positions, and pass that collection through each modifier top to bottom

placement.__comment: For each position, offset XZ by rand(16)
For each position, move it to the top of the given heightmap for that XZ coordinate
For each position, keep only if the biome at that position has this PlacedFeature enabled

__comment3: Ok, now we call the configured feature once at each position in the result
